title: Lana Del Rey is a bundle of smiles as she leaves airport with hunky cop boyfriend Sean Larkin
text:
Lana Del Rey was the picture of happiness as she emerged from JFK Airport in New York on Friday with her beau Sean Larkin.

The 34-year-old songstress was seen beaming and holding a tray of coffee while walking with the 46-year-old cop and reality star.

While Lana stuck to a simple black sweater and leggings, her silver fox showed off his sculpted arms in a Cabin Boys Brewery tee.

Jet set: Lana Del Rey was the picture of happiness as she emerged from JFK Airport in New York on Friday with her beau Sean Larkin

Sean, a police sergeant whose nickname is 'Sticks,' is one of the stars of the A&E reality show Live PD hosted by ABC anchor Dan Abrams.

Lana's romance with him went public at the end of September when they were glimpsed enjoying a stroll together in Central Park.

'I didn't know we were being photographed. I would've worn something different,' she gamely told the Los Angeles Times about being seen with Sean.

In transit: The 34-year-old songstress was seen beaming and holding a tray of coffee while walking with the 46-year-old cop and reality star

Lana, who spent three years with Kassidy singer Barrie-James O’Neill, said: 'It's funny because I was with someone for years and we never had that problem.'

The singer born Elizabeth Grant, whose stage name was inspired by Lana Turner, said of Sean: 'He’s a good cop. He gets it. He sees both sides of things.'

She understands fans' interest in her love life, dishing: 'I care about what Bob Dylan is doing right now. I'm curious to know if he's wearing a hoodie or a blazer. I get it.'

Hunk: While Lana stuck to a simple black sweater and leggings, her silver fox showed off his sculpted arms in a Cabin Boys Brewery tee

Lana released her latest LP Norman F***ing Rockwell! in August and is planning to drop another album called White Hot Forever next year.

She left Barrie-James in 2014 and he claimed to the Scottish Sun that he only found out about the split when she gave an interview about it.

'Looking back, it probably wasn’t easy living with me - I’m an insomniac and have depression. I understand why she did it,' he said, confessing that he 'felt like a burden on Lana,' who had been financially supporting him.
description: Lana Del Rey was the picture of happiness as she emerged from JFK Airport in New York on Friday with her beau Sean Larkin.
